dn21:1.3.3: jalatisu → jālatissu (bj); jalatassu (sya-all, km); jalitassu (pts1ed) | jhāyatisu → jhāyatissu (bj); jhāyatassu (sya-all, km); pajjhāyitassu (pts1ed)
dn21:1.4.2: tadantaraṁ → tadanantara (bj); tadanantaraṁ (sya-all, km, pts1ed, mr)
dn21:1.6.3: na ca pana → neva pana (sya-all, km)
dn21:1.11.6: itthittaṁ → itthicittaṁ (cck, pts1ed); itthīcittaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed, km) | purisattaṁ → purisacittaṁ (sya-all, km, pts1ed)
dn21:1.12.16: Buddhassa dhammāni paṭiggahesuṁ → buddhassa dhammaṁ na paṭiggahesuṁ (sya-all, km, pts1ed)
dn21:1.12.37: byāyāma → viyāyamāma (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed) | viyāyāma → byāyamāma (bj); vigāyāma (sya-all, km); vitāyāma (pts1ed)
dn21:1.12.45: sannāni guṇāni → sandānaguṇāni (bj, pts1ed); santāni guṇāni (sya-all, km)
dn21:2.1.1: devānamindo bhagavatā imaṁ bhagavantaṁ → devānamindo bhagavantaṁ imaṁ (pts1ed)
dn21:2.7.4: pana → yañca pana (sya-all, km); yañca pana (pts1ed)
dn21:2.7.25: samupabyūḷho → samūpabyuḷho (cck); samupabyuḷho (sya1ed, sya2ed, km); samūpabbūḷho (pts1ed)
dn21:2.9.33: Tvameva asi → tvameva sivaṁ (sya-all, km); tuvamevasi (pts1ed)
